name: All Black For Firefox 3
description:
This is an alterntative to my glasser theme, that can be used without glasser being installed. 

*** This requires the latest nightly, due to changes by https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=431309 that add the -moz-win prefix.

*** Freestyler, try loading with the latest nightly. Does it work then?

*** Update, now the findbar is themed.
